Buy it here for the best value as you will need to use this daily while under a doctors supervision. This along with oral antibiotics seems to do the trick. It will dry your skin just a little but its well worth the healing.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Society has went to HELL
customer_reviews.text: I hope everyone that’s price gouging everybody is held liable and they can’t sell anything else!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more break outs!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a break out in a month since using this!! I'm a believer. I have struggled with acne my whole life and finally I am all clear and continue to be. Will recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: nikki blackwood

customer_reviews.title: if you have MRSA this is a must
customer_reviews.text: this stuff has help me out a lot I do recommend putting it in a foaming bottle makes it last a whole lot longer if you have MRSA it is a must I have not had another cyst come up scene I have started using it thank you God
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth T.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best OTC washes around
customer_reviews.text: Nothing beats this stuff for sensitive skin / skin conditions. Mine is localized to the upper part of my torso, and one of the ONLY things it reacts well to is Hibiclens. There are other versions of this sort of antimicrobial wash out there in the market, but they don't have the effectiveness that Hibiclens does - in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: David Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great for foaming soap dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I am using this in a foaming soap dispenser and it works great. The packaging is basic and labels are very informative. It was very easy to pour into the dispenser and is not too thick to make foam. I have had to water down other soaps in order to use it but this works out of the box. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dove Family

customer_reviews.title: No protective seal, lighter in color.
customer_reviews.text: It was not sealed in any way. Nothing over or under the lid. Coloring was also lighter than the other bottle I had, which I purchased at the store (and came with a seal under the lid). Can’t return it, so I threw away $17. I won’t be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Adria Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed In Quality and Inconsistency
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this product regularly and decided to purchase from Amazon because of the quicker shipping option. Unfortunately this version of this product did not match versions purchases from other sources. It features a different scent and much lower level of foaming when in use. The consistency of the liquid was much thinner and led red than other versions of the product obtained through other sources. The benefits of using this product rely on feeling confident in it's authenticity, such drastic differences in product features are worrisome when needing the product for medical purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Karlyn Backus

customer_reviews.title: Makes me feel better, knowing I'm disinfected, when I really need it.
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day, after cleaning out my cat litter boxes. Great product when you want to make sure your disinfected, like if your other half gets the flu, or your dogs or cats have a accident, and you have to clean it up....I don't use this all the time, just for nasty things, like the animals messes.
customer_reviews.author: Eyes wide openTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: NO REGRETS! 100000% SATISFIED!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing and a lifesaver for wounds, cuts, scrapes and more and to reassure of keeping any wounds etc clean. The price of the 32oz, even more lately, you can't find in stores but it is SO WORTH IT, NO REGRETS. The 16 fl oz bottle was pricey but necessary and the foam pump does help a lot. A 32 oz bottle can fill it at least 3 times depending on how often you use it. I use it quite frequently between myself and two others and 3 months it lasts easily! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Marie :)

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to stop constant infections at my infusion sites
customer_reviews.text: It did that and more. I figured that since bacteria on the skin cause BO as they feed on my sweat, getting rid of those bacteria should greatly reduce my body odor. It worked, I could go for three or for days without needing deodorant. This soap is very strong and comes with some serious cautions on the label. Don't get it in your eyes or ears. It pretty much all redness and soreness at my infusion sites(where my insulin pump needle goes through my skin).
customer_reviews.author: David Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Really helps my skin
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works for skin bumps. I have been using it soley, avoiding regular soaps and gels. As others mentioned, I too put it in a foaming pump, which I highly recommend. It may not smell like Bath&Body Works but it does not smell bad. I recommend for anyone with skin issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great soap
customer_reviews.text: I normally like to use Provon but I couldn't handle how dry my skin would get. Chlorhexidine is a great alternative when used properly. I was impressed with how gentle Hibiclense is on my face and how well it works to clear up breakouts. My skin doesn't feel so dry now. My tattoos heal quickly when I use this soap as well. My surgeon recommended I use this soap on all my cuts, tattoos and piercings. I'm sold on this stuff. It has so many uses and I don't think I'll use another antibacterial soap after trying this brand!
customer_reviews.author: L. Wolfsburg

customer_reviews.title: Good for acne...only use it 1-2 times a week
customer_reviews.text: This product helps with painful, cystic acne. However, this product is very strong and should not be used on sensitive skin. For example, I have an oily face, but I have eczema on my fingers so it can sting a little bit when I am washing my face. I use it like once or twice a week when I come home with a lot of oil on my face. I use it as a second cleanser, after using tea tree soap. Make sure you use moisturizer afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: nanax8bm

customer_reviews.title: It is amazing as to the dead skin that it removes
customer_reviews.text: We used this product when going in for outpatient surgery! It is amazing as to the dead skin that it removes. Recommend using a white wash clothe so you can see the full affect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Management of Chronic Wounds
customer_reviews.text: I am retired from healthcare and knew the value of this product when I began using it at home. Seven years ago, I suffered a complicated fracture of my ankle which required multiple surgeries. I developed a MRSA infection after my last surgery followed by venous stasis insufficiency which led to the development of skin ulcers and two soft tissue infections. I began using Hibiclens as a part of my daily wound care regimen, and though the ulcers will probably never heal due to the venous insufficiency, I have had no further infections since I began using it. It has been a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sealed and very watery
customer_reviews.text: I do not yet know if this stuff will give me the results I am expecting on my skin, based on using other microbial soap. I am very doubtful because the bottle was not packaged in any way, and it was not sealed. I am lucky it was not broken and leaked all over like other reviews. It is very watery! I'll probably be asking for my money back. I hate being ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Was told to get this by my doctor for a fungal infection/ staph. It is amazing strong soap and does it’s job. It definitely gets rid of all the nasty stuff off your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to write home about, but will do
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't seem to work as well as the Walgreens liquid did, but I will finish the bottle anyway. I will probably go back to the Walgreens soap if I need to. UPDATE: This still doesn't work as well as I would like, but it does well enough for me to continue using it.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: household must have
customer_reviews.text: I had MRSA and this stuff prevented my kids and husband from getting it and helped kill my infected. I bathe with this once a week or as needed. when I had mrsa I used it daily for 3 weeks. I put mine in a spray bottle and sprayed it all over my body and lathered it AFTER washing with my regular body wash. some people mixed it in there body wash but I prefer to not dilute it. it didn't make me itch or dry my skin out
customer_reviews.author: PILAR

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff.
customer_reviews.text: One of my PC doctor's recommended this for me to use under my armpits, as I tend to get cysts there, which are very common. After determining it was not the deodorant that I used or from shaving, she just recommended that I use this to clean under my armpits instead of regular soap or body wash. I have to say, so far so good. Only time will tell if it will really keep those pesky bumps away, but I'm hoping it does. I also use it to wash my hands when I run out of my regular hand wash.
customer_reviews.author: Alina Hart

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was terrible but good product.
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this product but half of the bottle was empty as the liquid was spilt all over the cardboard box! I found that there was no plastic lid that seals in the liquid when you purchase a brand new bottle. I'm using the remainder of the product and I do like it. I just hope the seller heeds the feedback from customers as there has been numerous complaints about similar experiences. Give us another bottle or half the money we spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I prefer this soap over all others
customer_reviews.text: I started using this as my soap when it was prescribed prior to surgery. I thought, "If it's that good, I should use it every day." It doesn't foam, which some people don't like, but I like having a cleanser with a trace of antiseptic all in one Plus, being a liquid, it fits and refills nicely into soap dispensers. The only negative is that it can discolor washcloths if not rinsed out very thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: TravelGal99

customer_reviews.title: Hibiclens is great! It is thin and easy to waste
customer_reviews.text: Hibiclens is great! It is thin and easy to waste. I solved this problem by buying a small spray bottle. Pour the solution in the spray bottle and just spray on the area you want to clean. I also spray on my hair while lathering with soap/body wash and scrub entire body. I use it every week or so. Hibiclens will kill staph in short order. It can also be used for minor cuts or scrapes. I always keep some on hand.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Spruill

customer_reviews.title: Very thin cleanser
customer_reviews.text: It looks Like a lot comes in the bottle until you use it. This soap is very liquidy and thin. When you buy a definitely get the pump that is sold separately. It is too thin to pour out into your hand. Also I have a fiberglass tub and I noticed that there was pink stains all over but the bleach cleaner did get it out. I probably won’t purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Really good product to fight MRSA
customer_reviews.text: Helps to keep the skin clean. Have suffered from boils in the past and Hibiclens really seems to keep them away. This is also a good product to have around if you do get a deep cut to help with the healing of the wound. MRSA is deadly and this product is excellent in fighting it.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Borealis

customer_reviews.title: Superior Cleansing Product!
customer_reviews.text: My doctor prescribed this product to combat microbes affecting my skin. It is highly effective and relieves problems they were causing! Precautions are required for using the product, but they are not severe. I was told to use it every other day for best results.
customer_reviews.author: PlumCrazy

customer_reviews.title: No seal!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t come sealed. So who knows what’s actually in the bottle. Waste of money. This is a non returnable item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I had to have surgery on my shattered ankle. When I was finally able to get the cast of this was part of my regime to not get my incisions infected. I was worried because having a cast over surgery cuts leaves it looking and feeling horrible when the cast is removed. My skin was falling off! But this stuff helped make sure that it all healed well and stayed disinfected.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Pollitt

customer_reviews.title: Works well for fighting fungus
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. It has helped clean up certain persistent skin infections, is also good to combat fungus. The soap is thin and runny, but if you take that into account it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Rohvannyn Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I had to use this as a body wash prior to surgery. Then, we rescued 3 tiny kittens & bottle fed them not knowing they had ringworm. I got infected as well as four of my dogs. Bathed myself & the dogs with this product. The use of this & Lotrimin ointment got us all cleared up. No more ringworm!!
customer_reviews.author: CMelton

customer_reviews.title: I’m a Full Time User
customer_reviews.text: Was given a sample while admitted for elective surgery; now I’m a full time user. Easy to apply, rinses quick and clean while in the shower. Makes my skin feel naturally clean and dry. No harsh scents, which is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Pic

customer_reviews.title: No seal.
customer_reviews.text: Bottle came without a seal. I saw this in the reviews, but hoped I’d be lucky. Not sure if this is untampered product because I’ve never used hibiclens before, so nothing to compare it to. Bought to help a dog with a skin yeast problem. Will update after aired used it a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

product_meta.title: Hibiclens Antimicrobial/Antiseptic Skin Cleanser 32 Fluid Ounce Bottle for Antimicrobial Skin Cleansing
product_meta.description: Hibiclens is a medical grade liquid antimicrobial cleanser, proven to kill many harmful bacteria (including MRSA), viruses and fungi. Washing with Hibiclens before contact with contaminated skin and surfaces will help eliminate the risk of transfer. Add Hibiclens to your first aid kit, car kit, diaper bag, or purse for all those times you need to clean hands but can't get to a sink. Whether you're attending school or camp, competing in athletic events, or shopping for groceries, you can use Hibiclens in those situations which enable the spread of bacteria and viruses, but leave you without a convenient way to wash your hands. Gentle enough for daily use to protect against germs and flu.
feature_bullets: HIBICLENS ANTIMICROBIAL, ANTISEPTIC SKIN CLEANSER: Hibiclens safeguards against germs for up to 24 hrs, so it's a great choice to fight germs, fungi & bacteria during sports, school, work & home. Hibiclens antibacterial soap is gentle on sensitive skin.

HOME & HEALTH CARE: Hibiclens Antimicrobial soap is used in hospitals & by doctors for its antiseptic properties. Used as a suface wound cleanser, or to keep hands & skin germ free, Hibiclens antibacterial wash is useful at home & the hospital.

HIBICLENS KILLS BACTERIA: Hibiclens kills bacteria, viruses & fungi & continues killing germs for up to 24 hours after washing. It’s antibacterial soap that's gentle on even sensitive skin, even with frequent use, & is perfect for cleansing hands or skin.

HIBICLENS IN HOSPITALS & HOME: Hibiclens is made by Molnycke, a world-leading medical products company aiming for the best patient, clinical & economic outcomes. We strive to find new ways to minimize community & hospital-acquired infections & conditions.

PROTECT YOURSELF WITH HIBICLENS: Hibiclens antibacterial skin cleanser washes, & protects for up to 24 hours. Try Hibiclens if your family has used Dove Sensitive Skin Body Wash, Safeguard Bar Soap, Dial Antibacterial Soap, or Cetaphil Soap.
